radiographic_examinations.findings: Hydrocephalus, without a midline shift or mass.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the brain after the administration of contrast material
radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral enlargement of the lateral, third, and fourth ventricles and effacement of the sulci.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI after the administration of gadolinium
radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderate, diffuse ventricular enlargement with an abnormally bright T2-weighted signal surrounding the ependymal surfaces; a thin-walled cystic structure, 1.8 cm in diameter, in the fourth ventricle; a nonenhancing isointense nodule, 3 mm in diameter, in the lateral aspect of the cystic structure; and enlargement of the optic-nerve sheaths.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the cervical, thoracic, and lumbar spine
radiographic_examinations.findings: A nonenhancing cystic structure, 11 mm by 4 mm, in the left lateral aspect of the spinal canal adjacent to the T7 vertebral body.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the head (next admission)
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Slightly larger ventricles than were seen in studies obtained 2 years earlier.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Intracranial pseudomeningocele at the craniotomy site; a round-to-oval cystic lesion, 2 cm in diameter, at the base of the resection cavity.
Multiple extra-medullary, intradural cysts, with enhancing fine septations, posterior to the cord in the upper cervical and lumbar spine.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the brain (routine follow-up 7 years later)
radiographic_examinations.findings: Prominent synechiae along both cerebellopontine angles, with new enhancement on the left side.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: T2-weighted MRI scan of the cervical spine (second admission)
radiographic_examinations.findings: Cyst in the basal cistern ventral to the medulla with slight mass effect on that structure.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the lumbar spine (second admission)
radiographic_examinations.findings: Cysts, thickening and adhesions of the nerve roots, and hypointense filamentous structures suggestive of fibrotic strands.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: AXIAL fluid-attenuated inversion recovery (T2-weighted, postcontrast T1-weighted images)
radiographic_examinations.findings: Filamentous, enhancing structures extending from the left ventral pons to the skull base.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI after treatment course of albendazole and prednisone
radiographic_examinations.findings: Resolution of symptoms and improvement of findings.
